title: Record of Enrollment by Grade Level
description: This document records the details of an enrollment by grade level

CountyEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the county

LEAEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the LEA

SchoolEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the school

PS.description: The number of students in the Pre-School grade level

KG.description: The number of students in the Kindergarten grade level

G01.description: The number of students in the 1st grade level

G02.description: The number of students in the 2nd grade level

G03.description: The number of students in the 3rd grade level

G04.description: The number of students in the 4th grade level

G05.description: The number of students in the 5th grade level

G06.description: The number of students in the 6th grade level

G07.description: The number of students in the 7th grade level

G08.description: The number of students in the 8th grade level

G09.description: The number of students in the 9th grade level

G10.description: The number of students in the 10th grade level

G11.description: The number of students in the 11th grade level

G12.description: The number of students in the 12th grade level

Ungraded.description: The number of students in the ungraded grade level

Total.description: The total number of students in the school
